metadata.title: USN-7116-1 -- Python vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that Python incorrectly handled quoting path names when using the venv module. A local attacker able to control virtual environments could possibly use this issue to execute arbitrary code when the virtual environment is activated.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-7116-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  idle-python3.10 - 3.10.12-1~22.04.7 libpython3.10 - 3.10.12-1~22.04.7 libpython3.10-dev - 3.10.12-1~22.04.7 libpython3.10-minimal - 3.10.12-1~22.04.7 libpython3.10-stdlib - 3.10.12-1~22.04.7 libpython3.10-testsuite - 3.10.12-1~22.04.7 python3.10 - 3.10.12-1~22.04.7 python3.10-dev - 3.10.12-1~22.04.7 python3.10-doc - 3.10.12-1~22.04.7 python3.10-examples - 3.10.12-1~22.04.7 python3.10-full - 3.10.12-1~22.04.7 python3.10-minimal - 3.10.12-1~22.04.7 python3.10-nopie - 3.10.12-1~22.04.7 python3.10-venv - 3.10.12-1~22.04.7 No subscription required
